class.name: PinJoint
class.description: Pin Joint for 3D Rigid Bodies. It pins 2 bodies (rigid or static) together.

members.member: The force with wich the pinned objects stay in positional relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.
The force with wich the pinned objects stay in velocity relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.
If above 0, this value is the maximum value for an impulse that this Joint produces.
